Borussia Dortmund have offered $40 million for talented striker Lautaro Martinez, according to rumors in Argentina.

Martinez was linked with a move to Borussia Dortmund in January, but the club ended up signing Michy Batshuayi on loan. It was thought that the 20 year old was on his way to Italian side Inter Milan, but now it seems that Der BVB have hijacked the bid.

According to Argentinian outfit TYC Sports, Dortmund have offered 40 million dollars, which is more than Inter Milan’s offer of 33 million dollars. The forward was thought to have a pre contract agreement with the Italian giants, but could reneg that to move to the Bundesliga.

Borussia Dortmund are planning to raid FC Koln in the summer, with Dominique Heintz the latest player on their wishlist.

The Black and Yellows have already been linked with two FC Köln players, Jonas Hector and Timo Horn. And now, according to German outlet BILD, Borussia Dortmund have made defender Dominique Heintz their number one target, if Sokratis leaves the club in the summer.

Heintz is likely to be available for 10 million euros if Köln are relegated this season. And wth the Billy Goats languishing at the bottom of the table, relegation seems inevitable.

The Black and Yellows are rumored to be keeping tabs on West Ham United wonderkid Domingos Quina. According to English outlet The Sun, the talented playmaker is on Borussia Dortmund’s radar for a summer transfer. The 18-year old is one of the brightest prospects in England and has already played four times for the English club.

"We will decide about the future once we've qualified for the Champions League," Zorc told Eurosport on Sunday ahead of a 1-0 win against Hannover, adding: "That concerns the coaching position but we also know that changes must be made to the squad. Currently, [the squad] isn't what we had imagined."

多特蒙德中文粉絲 BVB 09 Borussia Dortmund fanpage TW
11 分鐘 ·
關於去年4.11 隊巴爆炸案,
全案仍在審查過程, 陸續傳喚多位証人
包含目擊者及當時受傷的警察

1月底Bartra 以証人身份出庭, 當天Auba以身體不適為由
向法庭請假沒有出庭作証.

今日稍早
再次開庭,嫌犯Sergej W. 承認犯案,但否認意圖殺人.

今日到場作証的球員有
Passlack, Sven , Schmelzer ,Weidenfeller 及當時的教練Tuchel

以下來自德國新聞社記者在現場同步推文,

Passlack 說到,回想起那記憶仍覺驚恐,
他在事後感覺焦慮了一段時間, 時常因為一些聲響而嚇到.

Sven ,述敍了當時發生的情形.
並說到,回想起來認為隔天就比賽是很不對的.
(此連結的Sky報導中提到Sevn說這件事對他轉會的決定有所影響,但主要仍是運動方面的考慮)

門將教練Teddy 的証詞也說到,
回頭想,隔日重賽的確是不對的決定.

Schmelzer ,述敍了當時巴士上發生的情形.
所有人都感到驚恐.
並也認為隔日重賽是錯誤的決定,當晚沒有人能入睡.
隔天重登隊巴前往球場,實在是很不好受.

Weidenfeller 証實他目前仍在接受心理方面的幫助.
而那個事件,在隊中仍造成影響.

理療師SwantjeThomßen 提到 Bartra送到醫院第一時間
有些圍觀者對他們照攝,令她感到很生氣

Tuchel 的証詞提到,
不應該隔天就重賽. 他提到Watzke 曾公開表示和他有過爭議,
他說他和Watzke的確為這件事的處理方式有爭議.
這事件是他的合約中止的原因之一.
他認為他和Watzke看法的差異主要來自於他當時人在車上,
而Watzke沒有.
針對法官提問, 他回答道:
他的確認為如果沒有發生這個爆炸案,他現在仍會是多特蒙德的教練.

Peter Stöger: "We did way too many things wrong. The basic virtues that were once the basis for success here at Borussia Dortmund were missing. When you play against a team that has that much quality and ambition, it can go really wrong if you don't display those basic virtues. Bayern exploited our weaknesses mercilessly, playing like we did you can never hope to compete at the same level. Today we were made to pay heavily for the way we defended. We invited Bayern to score goals by making individual errors. They were gifts that cannot be allowed to happen. But I am not interested in criticising individual errors. It's about the attitude. We're not playing like a team with the ambition of being the second-best in Germany. Perhaps a hammering like this will even do us good, by allowing us to be even more critical in our evaluation."
